latest news.eng_title: A Recap of the Iconic VMAs Performance Nominees
latest news.summary: The 2024 MTV Video Music Awards is honoring iconic performances from the past four decades. Taylor Swift leads the nominations with 12 categories. The nominees for the Most Iconic VMAs performance category include Madonna's 'Like a Virgin' (1984), Eminem's 'The Real Slim Shady' & 'The Way I Am' (2000), Britney Spears, Christina Aguilera, Madonna & Missy Elliott's 'Like a Virgin' & 'Hollywood' (2003), Lady Gaga's 'Paparazzi' (2009), Taylor Swift's 'You Belong With Me' (2009), Beyoncé's 'Love on Top' (2011), and Katy Perry's 'Roar' (2013). These performances sparked controversy, inspired generations of theatrical performances, and brought the artists to new levels of fame.
latest news.title: A Recap of the Iconic VMAs Performance Nominees

latest news.eng_title: Taylor Swift Leads MTV Video Music Awards Nominees with 12 Nominations
latest news.summary: Taylor Swift leads the list of nominees for the MTV Video Music Awards (VMA) with 12 nominations in the categories of 'Video', 'Artist', and 'Song of the Year'. She is followed closely by Post Malone with 11 nominations, including their collaborative hit 'Fortnight' and 'I Had Some Help' with country singer Morgan Wallen. Eminem received 8 nominations, while Ariana Grande, Megan Thee Stallion, Sabrina Carpenter, and SZA each received 7. Other notable nominees include Billie Eilish, Dua Lipa, Beyoncé, Doja Cat, Benson Boone, and GloRilla. Katy Perry will receive the 'Video Vanguard Award' for her hit 'Teenage Dream'. Megan Thee Stallion, 29, will host the show on September 11. The event will take place in New York, with live performances confirmed for Katy Perry, Camila Cabello, Sabrina Carpenter, and GloRilla. The VMA awards have been presented since 1984, and fans can vote online for their favorites. The awards are represented by a figurine of an astronaut holding an MTV flag. Taylor Swift's 2009 performance of 'You Belong With Me' is included in the list of nominees for 'Most Iconic VMA Performance of All Time', demonstrating her lasting impact on music. Despite Taylor Swift's significant lead, Katy Perry is also recognized with the 'Video Vanguard Award' for her influential musical career, particularly with her hit 'Teenage Dream'.
latest news.title: Тейлор Свифт получает дополнительные номинации на премию MTV Video Music Awards

latest news.eng_title: Taylor Swift Leads VMA Nominations with 12 Nominations

Event: Most Iconic VMA Performance of All Time
Title: Video Vanguard Award

latest news.summary: Taylor Swift, 34, leads the nominations for the MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) with 12 nominations in categories such as Video, Artist, and Song of the Year. She is followed closely by Post Malone, who has 11 nominations, including a collaborative hit 'Fortnight' with Swift and 'I Had Some Help' with country singer Morgan Wallen. Other notable nominees include Eminem, Ariana Grande, Megan Thee Stallion, Sabrina Carpenter, and SZA, each with seven nominations. Katy Perry, 39, will receive the 'Video Vanguard Award' this year, while Megan Thee Stallion, 29, will host the ceremony on September 11. The event will take place in New York, with confirmed live performances from Katy Perry, Camila Cabello, Sabrina Carpenter, and GloRilla. 'You Belong With Me', a powerful performance by Taylor Swift in 2009, is included in the nominations for the 'Most Iconic VMA Performance of All Time', highlighting its lasting impact on music. As Katy Perry is recognized with the 'Video Vanguard Award' for her influential music career, particularly with her hit 'Teenage Dream', Swift's significant lead in nominations is undeniable.

latest news.eng_title: Taylor Swift Leads MTV Video Music Awards Nominations with 12 Nominations
latest news.summary: Taylor Swift leads the nominations for the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) with an impressive 12 nominations in categories such as Video, Artist, and Song of the Year. The event has added four new categories, including 'Song of the Summer', 'Best Group', 'Best Trending Video', and 'Best VMA Performance of All Time'. The new 'Best Performance' category features legendary performances like Madonna's 'Like a Virgin' in 1984, Lady Gaga's 'Paparazzi' in 2009, Katy Perry's 'Roar' in 2013, and Taylor Swift's own performance in 2009 with 'You Belong With Me'. The competition for Swift is fierce, with Post Malone close behind with 11 nominations, including the hit collaborative 'Fortnight' with Swift and 'I Had Some Help' with country singer Morgan Wallen. Meanwhile, Eminem received 8 nominations, while Ariana Grande, Megan Thee Stallion, Sabrina Carpenter, and SZA each have 7. Other contenders for the award include Billie Eilish, Doja Cat, Beyoncé, Dua Lipa, Benson Boone, and GloRilla. Katy Perry will be honored with the 'Video Vanguard Award' this year. Megan Thee Stallion, 29, will host the event on September 11. The VMAs have been awarding prizes since 1984. Fans can vote online for their favorites. The trophies are a figure of an astronaut holding an MTV flag. Taylor Swift's powerful performance with 'You Belong With Me' in 2009 is included in the nominations for 'Best VMA Performance of All Time', highlighting its lasting impact on music. Despite Taylor Swift's significant advantage, Katy Perry is also recognized with the 'Video Vanguard Award' due to her influential musical career, especially with her hit 'Teenage Dream'.
latest news.title: Taylor Swift Garante mais Indicações ao VMA

latest news.eng_title: Taylor Swift, Beyoncé, and Sabrina Carpenter among nominees for social categories at MTV VMAs 2024
latest news.summary: The 2024 MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) have announced their nominees for four social categories, including two new ones: Most Iconic Performance and Best Trending Video. Fans will have the opportunity to vote for their favorite artists in these categories. The nominees for Song of Summer include Taylor Swift, Billie Eilish, Kendrick Lamar, Ariana Grande, and Chappell Roan. The Best Group category features Imagine Dragons, NCT Dream, NSYNC, Coldplay, NewJeans, SEVENTEEN, TOMORROW X TOGETHER, and Twenty One Pilots. Notable nominees for Most Iconic Performance include Beyoncé's 'Love on Top' performance and Taylor Swift's first VMA performance of 'You Belong With Me.' The Best Trending Video category includes Beyoncé, Camila Cabello featuring Playboi Carti, Chappell Roan, Charli XCX, Megan Thee Stallion featuring Yuki Chiba, and Tinashe. The 2024 MTV VMAs will feature performances by several popular artists, including Katy Perry, Chappell Roan, Sabrina Carpenter, and Megan Thee Stallion, who will also host the event. Fans can participate in the voting process through MTV's Instagram Story at the designated times.
latest news.title: Taylor Swift, Beyoncé, and Sabrina Carpenter among nominees for social categories at MTV VMAs 2024

latest news.eng_title: Megan Thee Stallion hosts, Taylor Swift dominates: Here's what to know about the 2024 MTV VMAs
latest news.summary: Megan Thee Stallion will host the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards, marking her first time hosting an award show. The event will feature star-studded performances, including Katy Perry, who will receive the Video Vanguard Award. Taylor Swift dominates the nominations with 10, including eight for her 'Fortnight' music video and nods in the artist of the year and best pop categories. Other notable nominees include Post Malone, Ariana Grande, Bad Bunny, Eminem, and Sabrina Carpenter. Fan voting is live now and ends on Friday, with voting in the best new artist category remaining active throughout the show.
latest news.title: Megan Thee Stallion hosts, Taylor Swift dominates: Here's what to know about the 2024 MTV VMAs

news knowledge.eng_title: MTV VMAs 2024 Nominations Announced: Taylor Swift Leads the Pack
news knowledge.summary: The MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs) 2024 nominations have been announced, with Taylor Swift leading the pack for her video 'Fortnight' featuring Post Malone. Swift has a chance to extend her record for most wins in the Video of the Year category, which she has won four times before. 'Fortnight' is also nominated for Song of the Year and Best Collaboration. Other notable nominees include Post Malone with nine nominations, Ariana Grande, Eminem, and Sabrina Carpenter with six nominations each. The VMAs will take place on September 10, 2024, at the USB Arena in New York City, with voting open from August 6 to August 30 on the official MTV website.

news knowledge.eng_title: Taylor Swift Tops MTV Video Music Awards Nominations
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift leads the nominations for the MTV Video Music Awards with 10 nominations in various musical and technical categories. According to Billboard, if Swift wins four VMAs, she will tie with Beyoncé as the most awarded artist in the history of the awards. Other notable nominees include Anitta, Bad Bunny, Rauw Alejandro, Ariana Grande, Eminem, and Sabrina Carpenter, each with multiple nominations. The awards ceremony will take place in New York on September 10, 2024.

news knowledge.eng_title: Taylor Swift Leads MTV Video Music Awards 2024 Nominations with 10 Nods
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift has received the most nominations for the MTV Video Music Awards 2024, with a total of 10 nominations. This is the highest number in the upcoming edition, which will take place on September 10 in New York. Last year, Swift won four awards, including Video of the Year, Song of the Year, Artist of the Year, and Best Pop Song. This year, the main competition is with Post Malone, who has nine nominations, all for collaborations, including one with Swift for 'Fortnight' and another with Morgan Wallen for 'I Had Some Help.' Ariana Grande, Sabrina Carpenter, and Eminem follow with six nominations, while Megan Thee Stallion and SZA have five, and LISA, Olivia Rodrigo, and Teddy Swims have four.

news knowledge.eng_title: MTV VMAs: Taylor Swift and Post Malone lead the list of nominees
news knowledge.summary: MTV has announced the nominations for the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards, with Taylor Swift leading the list with 10 nominations, including Artist of the Year and Video of the Year for 'Fortnight' featuring Post Malone. Post Malone closely followed with nine nominations. The awards will take place on September 10 at UBS Arena in New York and will air on MTV at 8 p.m. EDT. Fans can vote for their favorites in 15 categories at vote.mtv.com from August 7 to August 30. If Swift were to win Video of the Year, she would break her own record to become the only artist to ever win the award three times in a row and five times in the category, according to MTV.
news knowledge.title: MTV VMAs: Taylor Swift and Post Malone lead the list of nominees

news knowledge.eng_title: MTV VMAs 2024: Taylor Swift leads the nominations with 10 chances to win
news knowledge.summary: The MTV Video Music Awards 2024 has finally released the list of nominees, and Taylor Swift is the most nominated artist with 10 chances to win, mainly for her video 'Fortnight' with Post Malone. Post Malone is also one of the most nominated artists with nine chances, including a nomination for 'I Had Some Help' with Morgan Wallen. Ariana Grande, Eminem, and Sabrina Carpenter, who is debuting for the first time, each have six nominations. As Taylor Swift said, 'It was a great day.' news knowledge.eng_title: Taylor Swift leads the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards nominations, followed by Post Malone
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift leads the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards nominations with 10 nods, including eight for her 'Fortnight' music video and nominations in the artist of the year and best pop categories. She is followed by Post Malone, who is nominated eight times and earned a ninth nomination for his country hit 'I Had Some Help,' featuring Morgan Wallen. The 2024 MTV VMAs will air live on Sept. 10 at 8 p.m. Eastern, with fan voting beginning online Tuesday across 15 gender-neutral categories and ending Aug. 30. This year marks 29 first-time nominees, including Wallen, Sabrina Carpenter, and Teddy Swims, who each have three nominations. Swift has won 23 VMAs in her career, placing her just behind Beyoncé, who has 28, and ahead of Madonna, who has 20, and Lady Gaga, who has 19.
news knowledge.title: Taylor Swift leads the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards nominations, followed by Post Malone

news knowledge.eng_title: Taylor Swift leads 2024 MTV VMA nominations with 10
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift leads the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards nominations with 10 total nominations, aiming to extend her record-breaking streak for video of the year. She would become the only artist to three-peat and win five times overall in the biggest category. Swift already holds the record for the most video of the year trophies. Other notable nominees include Post Malone, Sabrina Carpenter, Eminem, and Ariana Grande, who each received six nominations. Beyoncé received only one nod this year with 'Texas Hold 'Em' for song of the year. The 2024 VMAs will air live from Nassau County's UBS Arena on Sept. 10 at 8 p.m., with fans able to vote in 15 categories through Aug. 30.
news knowledge.title: Taylor Swift leads 2024 MTV VMA nominations with 10

news knowledge.eng_title: Taylor Swift Leads with 10 Nominations at the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift is the top contender for the most awards at the 2024 MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs), with a total of 10 nominations. According to MTV.com, Swift is nominated in categories such as 'Artist of the Year', 'Video of the Year' for her song 'Fortnight' featuring Post Malone, and 'Song of the Year' against Beyoncé's 'Texas Hold 'Em'. Swift's song 'Fortnight' is also nominated for 'Best Visual Effects' and 'Best Art Direction'. With up to 10 Moonman trophies, Swift could surpass her record of 9 wins last year. Post Malone has also earned 9 nominations for his collaboration on 'Fortnight'. Fans can start voting on the MTV website. Swift is currently on her 'The Eras' world tour and will perform five times at London's Wembley Stadium from August 15-20, closing the European leg of her tour.

news knowledge.eng_title: MTV VMAs 2024 Nominees Announced: See the Full List Here
news knowledge.summary: Taylor Swift has dominated the MTV Video Music Awards nominations with 10 nods, including eight for her Post Malone collaboration 'Fortnight' and its video. Post Malone received one extra nomination, putting him in second place overall, followed by Ariana Grande, Eminem, and Sabrina Carpenter, who received six nods each. Other notable nominees include Megan Thee Stallion, SZA, and Blackpink's Lisa, Olivia Rodrigo, and Teddy Swims, who each received five or four nominations. The 2024 MTV Video Music Awards will take place on September 10 at UBS Arena in Elmont, New York. Taylor Swift was the big winner at the 2023 MTV Video Music Awards, taking home seven out of eight nominations, including Video of the Year for 'Anti-Hero.'
